core.description: This scroll is inscribed with powerful magic that can identify the hidden properties of unknown items. It will always identify the first unknown item in your pack.
core.name: Scroll of Identify
Health Potion
core.description: Heals the target character for 1d6 hitpoints

events.onuse:
campaign.warning('%s is using a %s on %s' % (player.displayname(), item.displayname(), target.displayname()))
from ezdm_libs.util import rolldice
health, roll_message = rolldice(numdice=1, numsides=6, modifier=0)
campaign.message(roll_message)
result = target.heal(health)
campaign.error('%s has been healed for %s, and current hitpoints are %s' % (player.displayname(), health, result))

core.name: Scroll of Resurrection
core.description: Ressurrects a dead ally with 1 hitpoint. Takes ten rounds to read.

events.onfinish:
campaign.error('%s has finished casting Scroll of Resurrection at %s'  % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
hitpoints = target.get('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
if hitpoints > 0:
   campaign.error('%s is not dead ! What a waste of a scroll !')
else:
   campaign.error('%s resurrected with one hitpoint.')
   target.put('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
events.onuse:
hitpoints = target.get('/core/combat/hitpoints',1)
if hitpoints > 0:
   campaign.error('%s is not dead ! What a waste of a scroll !')
campaign.error('%s is casting Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onround: campaign.error('%s continues to cast Scroll of Ressurection at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))

core.description: This scroll is inscribed with powerful magic that can identify the hidden properties of unknown items. It will always identify the first unknown item in your pack.

core.description: Heals the target character for 1d6 hitpoints

events.onuse:
campaign.warning('%s is using a %s on %s' % (player.displayname(), item.displayname(), target.displayname()))
from ezdm_libs.util import rolldice

core.description: Heals the target for 1d6
core.name: Healing Hands

events.onfinish:
campaign.warning('%s has finished casting Healing Hands at %s'  % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
from ezdm_libs.util import rolldice
spell_success = player.spell_success()
if not spell_success[1]:
	campaign.error(spell_success)
else:
	healed = rolldice(numdice=1, numsides=6, modifier=1)
	campaign.error(healed[1])
	target.hitpoints += (healed)
	campaign.error(target.hitpoints)
events.onuse: campaign.error('%s is casting Magic Missile at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onround: campaign.error('%s continues to cast Magic Misile at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))

core.description: Caster charms an animal which fights alongside it as a companion. The spell takes three rounds to cast.
core.name: Animal Friendship

events.onfinish: campaign.error('%s has finished casting Animal Friendship at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onuse: campaign.error('%s is casting Animal Friendship at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))
events.onround: campaign.error('%s continues to cast Animal Friendship at %s' % (player.displayname(), target.displayname()))

core.name: Bronze Plate Gloves
core.description: Cheap plate gloves made from bronze.
These bracers add a small amount of extra armor but shine with shimmer that lets you see further.
core.name: Bronze Plate Bracers of illumination

core.description:
To use:
Swing vigorously.
core.name: One Handed Bronze Mace

core.description:
This "shield" is little more than a battered piece of bronze plate, there are some dents and suspicious looking stains on it. You think it may be second hand and you doubt the original owner
was alive when he lost it.
core.name: Small Bronze Shield
